name: auto-tab-groups
description: Cross-browser extension that automatically groups tabs by domain

scripts.build:chrome: npm run clean && cp src/manifest.chrome.json src/manifest.json && cd src && zip -r ../auto-tab-groups-chrome.zip . -x '*.DS_Store' 'manifest.*.json' && rm manifest.json && echo 'Chrome extension built: auto-tab-groups-chrome.zip'
scripts.build:firefox: npm run clean && cp src/manifest.firefox.json src/manifest.json && cd src && zip -r ../auto-tab-groups-firefox.xpi . -x '*.DS_Store' 'manifest.*.json' && rm manifest.json && echo 'Firefox extension built: auto-tab-groups-firefox.xpi'
scripts.build: npm run build:chrome && npm run build:firefox

author: Nitzan Papini
